Sql.query: insert into vtp_recalculo_potencia( pericodi, recpotcodi, recpotnombre, recpotinfovtp, recpotfactincecontrantacion, recpotfactincedespacho, recpotmaxidemamensual, recpotinterpuntames, recpotpreciopoteppm, recpotpreciopeajeppm, recpotpreciocostracionamiento, recpotpreciodemaservauxiliares, recpotconsumidademanda, recpotfechalimite, recpothoralimite, recpotcuadro1, recpotnota1, recpotcomegeneral, recacodi, pericodidestino, recpotestado, recpotusucreacion, recpotfeccreacion, recpotusumodificacion, recpotfecmodificacion, recpotcargapfr ) values( :pericodi, :recpotcodi, :recpotnombre, :recpotinfovtp, :recpotfactincecontrantacion, :recpotfactincedespacho, :recpotmaxidemamensual, :recpotinterpuntames, :recpotpreciopoteppm, :recpotpreciopeajeppm, :recpotpreciocostracionamiento, :recpotpreciodemaservauxiliares, :recpotconsumidademanda, :recpotfechalimite, :recpothoralimite, :recpotcuadro1, :recpotnota1, :recpotcomegeneral, :recacodi, :pericodidestino, :recpotestado, :recpotusucreacion, :recpotfeccreacion, :recpotusumodificacion, :recpotfecmodificacion, :recpotcargapfr )

update vtp_recalculo_potencia set recpotnombre = :recpotnombre, recpotinfovtp = :recpotinfovtp, recpotfactincecontrantacion = :recpotfactincecontrantacion, recpotfactincedespacho = :recpotfactincedespacho, recpotmaxidemamensual = :recpotmaxidemamensual, recpotinterpuntames = :recpotinterpuntames, recpotpreciopoteppm = :recpotpreciopoteppm, recpotpreciopeajeppm = :recpotpreciopeajeppm, recpotpreciocostracionamiento = :recpotpreciocostracionamiento, recpotpreciodemaservauxiliares = :recpotpreciodemaservauxiliares, recpotconsumidademanda = :recpotconsumidademanda, recpotfechalimite = :recpotfechalimite, recpothoralimite = :recpothoralimite, recpotcuadro1 = :recpotcuadro1, recpotnota1 = :recpotnota1, recpotcomegeneral = :recpotcomegeneral, recacodi = :recacodi, pericodidestino = :pericodidestino, recpotestado = :recpotestado, recpotusumodificacion = :recpotusumodificacion, recpotfecmodificacion = :recpotfecmodificacion, recpotcargapfr = :recpotcargapfr where pericodi = :pericodi and recpotcodi = :recpotcodi
delete from vtp_recalculo_potencia where pericodi = :pericodi and recpotcodi = :recpotcodi
select * from vtp_recalculo_potencia where pericodi = :pericodi and recpotcodi = :recpotcodi
select * from vtp_recalculo_potencia where pericodi = :pericodi order by recpotcodi desc
select nvl(max(recpotcodi), 0) + 1 from vtp_recalculo_potencia where pericodi = :pericodi

select rp.*, p.perinombre, r.recanombre, pd.perinombre as perinombredestino from vtp_recalculo_potencia rp left join trn_periodo p on rp.pericodi = p.pericodi left join trn_recalculo r on rp.pericodi = r.pericodi and rp.recacodi = r.recacodi left join trn_periodo pd on rp.pericodidestino = pd.pericodi order by p.perinombre asc, rp.recpotcodi

select r.*, (select p.perinombre from trn_periodo p where p.pericodi = r.pericodi) as perinombre from vtp_recalculo_potencia r where r.pericodidestino = (select a.pericodi from trn_periodo a where a.perianio = :perianio and a.perimes = :perimes) and r.recpotcodi > 1 and r.recpotestado = 'Cerrado' order by r.pericodi desc
select * from vtp_recalculo_potencia where pericodi = :pericodi and recpotcodi = :recpotcodi and recpotestado = 'Cerrado'

select rp.*, p.perinombre, r.recanombre, pd.perinombre as perinombredestino from vtp_recalculo_potencia rp left join trn_periodo p on rp.pericodi = p.pericodi left join trn_recalculo r on rp.pericodi = r.pericodi and rp.recacodi = r.recacodi left join trn_periodo pd on rp.pericodidestino = pd.pericodi where rp.pericodi = :pericodi and rp.recpotcodi = :recpotcodi order by p.perinombre asc, rp.recpotcodi
SELECT Recpotpreciopoteppm VALOPRECIOPOTENCIA FROM vtp_recalculo_potencia WHERE Pericodi = :pericodi and recpotcodi = (select max(recpotcodi) from vtp_recalculo_potencia where pericodi= :pericodi)
select pericodi, max(recpotcodi) as recpotcodi from vtp_recalculo_potencia where recpotcodi > 1 group by pericodi order by pericodi

SELECT p.perinombre, p.perianio, p.perimes, rp.recpotinterpuntames, rp.recpotpreciopoteppm FROM vtp_recalculo_potencia rp LEFT JOIN trn_periodo p ON rp.pericodi = p.pericodi AND p.perianio = {0} WHERE rp.recpotestado = 'Cerrado' AND recpotcodi IN (SELECT MAX(recpotcodi) FROM vtp_recalculo_potencia vtp WHERE vtp.pericodi = p.pericodi AND vtp.recpotestado = 'Cerrado') ORDER BY p.perimes
